description: Golden values for Tracker module (multi-wave trend analysis)

checks.name: change_wave1_to_wave2
checks.description: Change in satisfaction from Wave 1 to Wave 2

checks.name: change_wave2_to_wave3
checks.description: Change in satisfaction from Wave 2 to Wave 3

checks.name: sig_wave1_to_wave2
checks.description: Wave 1 to 2 change is statistically significant

checks.name: sig_wave2_to_wave3
checks.description: Wave 2 to 3 change is statistically significant

checks.name: ci_change_lower
checks.description: 95% CI lower bound for Wave 1-2 change

checks.name: ci_change_upper
checks.description: 95% CI upper bound for Wave 1-2 change
